title: Clinical Psychology Graduate Student Research on Human Anxiety Fund
description: To provide support for clinical psychology graduate student research on human anxiety, inflammation and behavioral  treatment within Dr. Joanna Arch's lab, in the Department of Psychology and Neuroscience at the University of Colorado Boulder.
marketingContent: To provide support for clinical psychology graduate student research on human anxiety, inflammation and behavioral treatment within Dr. Joanna Arch's lab, in the Department of Psychology and Neuroscience at the University of Colorado Boulder.
